title: Prince of Chaos
description: My mother keeps me prisoner to keep me safe.  Safe from the world. Safe from boys. And especially safe from Luther Hades, the most dangerous man in the world.  Sheâ€™d rather die than send me on an errand.  But now she has no other choice.  And someone new is waiting at the gate...  Prince of Chaos is the delicious prequel to King of Shadows, a contemporary retelling of the Hades & Persephone myth by USA Bestselling author Amelia Wilde. Consider it your invitation to this thrilling new world.
author: Amelia Wilde
